item.title: Policies
item.description: School Policies We are committed to working with parents and other support agencies to cater for the needs of all our staff and pupils. Below are our policies documents. Physical copies of the policies are available from the school reception. Behaviour Policy Code of Conduct Complaints Policy and Procedures Curriculum Plans (Year 1 - 6) Health and Safety Policy Pupil Assessment Policy Premises Plans Safeguarding Policy
